faq.description: Quickly find answers to your most common questions about UPJUNOO PRO.
faq.notFound: Didn't find the answer to your question?

items.question: How do I download the UPJUNOO PRO app?
items.answer: The UPJUNOO PRO app is available for free on the App Store for iOS and Google Play for Android. Search for 'UPJUNOO PRO' and download the app in seconds.

items.question: What payment methods are accepted?
items.answer: We accept several payment methods: credit card, mobile payment, e-wallet and cash payment depending on the region. You can set your preferred payment method in the app.

items.question: How do I become an UPJUNOO PRO driver?
items.answer: To become an UPJUNOO PRO driver, go to the 'Partner Offers > Drivers' page and fill out the registration form. You will be contacted by an approved fleet manager who will assist you through the process.

items.question: Is UPJUNOO PRO available in my city?
items.answer: UPJUNOO PRO is present in over 100 cities worldwide. Check our 'Our Locations' page to verify availability in your region. If we're not there yet, you can become a franchise!

items.question: How does the delivery service work?
items.answer: The UPJUNOO PRO delivery service allows you to send and receive packages in real time. Simply enter the pickup and delivery addresses, and a courier takes care of the rest. You can track your package live.

items.question: How do I contact customer support?
items.answer: Our support team is available 24/7. You can contact us via the app, by email at contact@upjunoopro.com, or via our Contact page. We are committed to responding as quickly as possible.

items.question: How do I become an UPJUNOO PRO franchise?
items.answer: To become a franchise, go to the 'Partner Offers > Franchises' page. There you will find all the information about the desired profile, benefits and conditions. Contact our team to discuss your project.

items.question: How are rides calculated?
items.answer: UPJUNOO PRO rides are calculated based on distance and travel time. You always see an estimate before confirming your ride. No surprises, everything is transparent.

intro.text: These Terms of Use govern access to and use of the UPJUNOO PRO platform, accessible via the mobile application and website. By using our services, you accept these terms in their entirety.

access.note: Some services may require registration, identity verification, or compliance with specific conditions depending on the country.

items.platform: UPJUNOO PRO acts as a technological intermediation platform.
items.partners: Drivers, couriers, and partners are responsible for service execution.
items.user: Users agree to provide accurate information and use the platform in compliance with applicable laws.

items.legal: Not use the platform for illegal purposes
items.respect: Respect drivers, couriers, and other users
items.report: Report any inappropriate behavior or incidents
items.security: Not attempt to bypass security systems

hero.title: Privacy

commitment.title: Our Commitment
commitment.text: Protecting your personal data is at the heart of our concerns. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use the UPJUNOO PRO platform.

dataCollected.title: Data Collected
dataCollected.description: As part of using the platform, we may collect the following data:

items.improve: Provide and improve mobility and logistics services
items.payments: Manage payments, billing, and customer support
items.statistics: Produce anonymized statistics to improve our services
items.updates: Inform you of updates and news

cookies.description: The UPJUNOO PRO website uses cookies to:
cookies.note: Users can configure or refuse cookies at any time via their browser settings.

security.title: Security and Privacy
security.description: UPJUNOO PRO applies strict technical and organizational measures to ensure data confidentiality and integrity:

rights.description: In accordance with applicable regulations, you have the following rights regarding your personal data:

access.description: You can request access to your personal data.

rectification.title: Right of Rectification
rectification.description: You can request correction of inaccurate data.

deletion.title: Right to Erasure
deletion.description: You can request deletion of your data under certain conditions.

opposition.title: Right to Object
opposition.description: You can object to the processing of your data.

metadata.title: FAQ
metadata.description: Quickly find answers to your questions about UPJUNOO PRO.

hero.title: Frequently Asked
hero.description: Quickly find answers to your most common questions about UPJUNOO PRO.

download.question: How do I download the UPJUNOO PRO app?
download.answer: The UPJUNOO PRO app is available for free on the App Store for iOS and Google Play for Android. Search for 'UPJUNOO PRO' and download the app in seconds.

free.question: Is the app free?
free.answer: Yes, the UPJUNOO PRO app is completely free to download and use. You only pay for the services you use (rides, deliveries, rentals).

account.question: How do I create an account?
account.answer: Download the app, then follow the registration steps by entering your phone number and personal information. An SMS verification will be sent to confirm your account.

methods.question: What payment methods are accepted?
methods.answer: We accept several payment methods: Mobile Money (Orange Money, MTN Money, Wave, etc.), cash payment depending on the region, and the UPJUNOO PRO electronic wallet. You can configure your preferred payment method in the app.

calculation.question: How are rides calculated?
calculation.answer: UPJUNOO PRO rides are calculated based on distance and travel time. You always see an estimate before confirming your ride. No surprises, everything is transparent.

invoice.question: Can I get an invoice?
invoice.answer: Yes, a receipt is automatically generated after each ride or service. You can find it in your trip history in the app.

book.question: How do I book a ride?
book.answer: Open the app, enter your destination, choose the type of vehicle you want and confirm. A driver will be assigned to you in moments and you can track their arrival in real time.

cancel.question: Can I cancel a ride?
cancel.answer: Yes, you can cancel a ride at any time before the driver arrives. Cancellation fees may apply if the driver has already been en route for some time.

rate.question: How do I rate my driver?
rate.answer: At the end of each ride, you are invited to rate your driver from 1 to 5 stars and leave a comment. This helps us maintain service quality.

how.question: How does the delivery service work?
how.answer: The UPJUNOO PRO delivery service allows you to send and receive packages in real time. Simply enter the pickup and delivery addresses, and a courier takes care of the rest. You can track your package live.

types.question: What types of packages can I send?
types.answer: You can send documents, small and medium-sized packages, groceries, and more. Dangerous, illegal, or perishable items are excluded from the service.

track.question: How do I track my delivery?
track.answer: Once your delivery is confirmed, you can track the courier's position in real time on the map in the app. You also receive notifications at each step.

how.question: How do I rent a vehicle?
how.answer: Download the UPJUNOO PRO app, select 'Rental', choose your vehicle, dates, and pickup point. Confirm your reservation and pay online. It's that simple!

documents.question: What documents are required to rent?
documents.answer: To rent a vehicle, you must present a valid ID (national ID or passport) and a valid driver's license. A deposit may be required depending on the vehicle type.

modify.question: Can I modify or cancel my reservation?
modify.answer: Yes, you can modify or cancel your reservation up to 24 hours before the pickup date at no charge. Beyond that, cancellation fees may apply.

city.question: Is UPJUNOO PRO available in my city?
city.answer: UPJUNOO PRO is present in several cities around the world. Check our 'Our Locations' page to verify availability in your region.

check.question: How do I know if the service is available where I am?
check.answer: Download the app and enter your address. If drivers are available in your area, you can order a service immediately.

driver.question: How do I become an UPJUNOO PRO driver?
driver.answer: To become an UPJUNOO PRO driver, go to the 'Become a Driver' page and contact an approved fleet manager who will assist you through the process.

franchise.question: How do I become an UPJUNOO PRO franchise?
franchise.answer: To become a franchise, go to the 'Partner Offers > Franchises' page. There you will find all the information about the desired profile, benefits, and conditions. Contact our team to discuss your project.

contact.question: How do I contact customer support?
contact.answer: Our support team is available 24/7. You can contact us via the app, by email at contact@upjunoopro.com, or via our Contact page. We are committed to responding as quickly as possible.

problem.question: I have a problem with a ride, what should I do?
problem.answer: Go to your trip history in the app, select the ride in question and click 'Report a Problem'. You can also contact us directly through support.

needHelp.title: Didn't find your answer?
needHelp.description: Our support team is available to help you.
